ticket.title: polymorphic_url should compact given array
ticket.original-body: For example, there is an usage of polymorphic_path like, @@@ ruby polymorphic_path([@project, @filter, @issue]) @@@ However, sometime @filter will be nil, but I don't get error such a "NoMethodError: undefined method `project_nil_class_issue_url'". I would rather get a same result of project_issue_url.
ticket.latest-body: For example, there is an usage of polymorphic_path like, @@@ ruby polymorphic_path([@project, @filter, @issue]) @@@ However, sometime @filter will be nil, but I don't get error such a "NoMethodError: undefined method `project_nil_class_issue_url'". I would rather get a same result of project_issue_url.
ticket.original-body-html:
For example, there is an usage of polymorphic_path like,


 polymorphic_path([@project, @filter, @issue])

However, sometime @filter will be nil, but I don't get error such a "NoMethodError: undefined method project_nil_class_issue_url'". I would rather get a same result of project_issue_url.

I would rather get a same result of project_issue_url.
version.body-html:
For example, there is an usage of polymorphic_path like,


 polymorphic_path([@project, @filter, @issue])

However, sometime @filter will be nil, but I don't get error such a "NoMethodError: undefined method project_nil_class_issue_url'". I would rather get a same result of project_issue_url.
